    • Method Detail

      • transfer

        public TransactionDto transfer(TransactionDto transactionDto)
                        throws EntryNotFoundException,
                               TokenException,
                               BankException,
                               InvalidTransferAmountException,
                               DuplicateEntryException
        Specified by:
        transfer in interface IPaymentService
        Parameters:
        transactionDto - data object used to transfer money from one account to another using a token
        Returns:
        gives the transfer details
        Throws:
        EntryNotFoundException - thrown when either of the accounts (debtor or creditor) do not exist
        TokenException - thrown when the token specified in parameters is invalid
        BankException - thrown when the bank is unavailable for transfers at the current time
        InvalidTransferAmountException - thrown when the amount of money specified is not allowed
        DuplicateEntryException - thrown when the transaction already exists

      • refund

        public void refund(java.util.UUID transactionId)
            throws EntryNotFoundException,
                   DuplicateEntryException
        Specified by:
        refund in interface IPaymentService
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the transaction to refund
        Throws:
        EntryNotFoundException - thrown when the transaction does not exist
        DuplicateEntryException - thrown when the transaction has already been refunded
